TextView.android:text: Hey Aq, so I never thought I'd be writting a goodbye letter to you; It seemed as if you were going to stay forever, and I know you and the C4Q team really wanted you to stay on board. As you mentioned you will be back in the US eventually and the only thing I can think of is: Enjoy your vacation in France. Hopefully you'll be hearing from all of us soon enough, with brand new jobs and exciting new things, and you'll be proud to have been a catalyst to our success. much love...
